channel.title: How to i make a client?
channel.description: people please HELP ME! i want to make a client please help me please! please please please please please please please please please please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 08:49:44 PM[/size][hr]i have a good BIG BIG BIG REWARD! SO PLEASE HELP! THX

item.title: How to i make a client?
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

[code]
MITB provides financial management solutions and accounting software for manufacturing, distribution, biotechnology and other industries. We deliver business results through:

* Needs Analysis and Accounting Software Selection
* Project and Implementation Management
* Network & telecomm systems assessment & installation
* Internet/Web applications
* Training and Technical Support [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to i make a client?

item.title: How to i make a client?
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:14, topic:180509”][quote author=hybrent link=topic=241796.msg2046392#msg2046392 date=1202719926]
Since this is your first client, i suggest downloading one off of the download section. Then changing the name, back ground, and add some new items. Open client.java in the folder you download and search up the name of the old client. After you find it replace it with your client name. For the back ground just find the image in one of their folders that is there back ground, but half of it is flipped. To change it just copy and paste your pic over that and then flip half of your pic around.Hope i helped at least a little…
[/quote]Wow, great advise, instead of actually helping him, you tell him to do what most of moparscape does (Which is the reason the mitb.com forum doesn’t like you), you go ahead and download something edit a few small things and say it is your own. [/quote]
well said… i hate when people down stuff and change stuff and say they made it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to i make a client?

item.title: How to i make a client?
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:7, topic:180509”]First download a basic client.

Go to client hacking section.

Find some gasoline.

Pour it all of your computer.

Light a match, throw it.

Poof, flaming client background.[/quote]

Wow, i tried that thanks i just gotta find out how make this a .jpg file…!

Read full topic
